name: Mirror Watcher
description:
A quick little horror game I tried making in a couple hours for MiniJam 121. 

This was my first attempt at a horror game and I had a lot more planned for this game but ended up not implementing the ideas.  

I loved the art for the Faith series of games and decided to try and make something in their style.

The game currently has one ending which is more of a death and I don't plan on updating it anytime soon. Enjoy!
